name: get_images_by_productid_siteid_zappos_1_6pm_2
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zappos_2022.
Tool description: ZAPPOS NEW ENDPOINTS
API description: Fetch images for a given product ID and site ID from the Zappos API.

siteid.description: The site ID (1 for Zappos, 2 for 6pm).

productid.description: The product ID for which images are to be fetched.
